title: Question 4
prompt: Choose the answer that is written correctly and shows the correct capitalization and punctuation. Be sure the answer you choose is complete.
feedback: The correct answer is, “I met the star of the show at a local store!” The sentence ends with an exclamation point. It is a sentence that shows emotion and excitement, so an exclamation point is appropriate. The other examples have incorrect end punctuation. Questions should end in a question mark: “Did you watch the newest episode? Is that your favorite TV show?” The choice “I watch that show once in a while” has no end punctuation. It should end in a period.
